Name: Orbital Strike VR
About the game: Beam turrets and railguns are breaking your corvettes in half. Nuclear torpedoes are weaving into formations, looking to annihilate everything, with point defense lasers desperately seeking them out. Let's get to work, Pilot. TACTICAL SPACE COMBAT SIMULATOR Dodge flak fields and close with enemy capital ships. Use your hand-held weapons to destroy turrets, ship subsystems, and fighter escorts. Give your fleet the opening it needs. VR FLIGHT - NO MOTION SICKNESS Catapult into free space and fly into combat using a unique hand-jet locomotion system, designed for a comfortable and motion-sickness free experience. FIRST-PERSON FLEET COMMAND We lead from the front. Configure, call-in, and direct capital ship fire support. Give orders to each ship in your fleet, assigning individual targets or bringing them all together for an alpha strike. DROP-IN CO-OP MULTIPLAYER Built from the ground up for online co-op multiplayer. Play single-player or invite your friends at any time to help even the odds. THE STARFALL CAMPAIGN Experience a voice acted campaign telling the story of The Sophron, an independent Starfall carrier, and their pilot as they investigate an outbreak alert at the deserted Epsilon Indi system. OUTBREAK: EVACUATION Outbreak is a replayable prologue mission that tells the story of the historical evacuation of the Beta Pegasi system. Select from random upgrades, purchase new modules for your carrier, and burn a route through the system to escort your fleet back home before the gate closes.
